snippet: An obscure London firm may decide whether Jamie Dimon remains both C.E.O. and chairman of JPMorgan Chase. | Kleiner Perkins is adjusting its strategy after hitting a rough patch. | Chrysler provides a lesson in how deals struck in haste can come back...
abstract: An obscure London firm may decide whether Jamie Dimon remains both C.E.O. and chairman of JPMorgan Chase. | Kleiner Perkins is adjusting its strategy after hitting a rough patch. | Chrysler provides a lesson in how deals struck in haste can come back to haunt. | Yahoo has met with executives of Hulu, according to a report.
